channel.title: Keycloak on Managed OpenShift Black Belt - Unofficial Documentation

item.title: Configure Red Hat SSO with Azure AD as a Federated Identity Provider
item.description: This guide demonstrates how to install and configure Red Hat SSO (Keycloak) into an Azure Red Hat OpenShift (ARO) cluster. It will also also configure the ARO cluster to use the SSO server as a mechanism to login by way of the OIDC protocol. In addition, Red Hat SSO can federate user identities with other identity providers. We will use Azure AD as an additional identity provider to show how this could be done.
